properties.description: SQL Script to attach raw view of northern re's vellum data.

content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [developmentdls] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://developmentdls.blob.core.windows.net/development-data-lake'
);
GO

CREATE SCHEMA [raw];
GO

CREATE VIEW [raw].[financial_model_inputs] AS
SELECT [nre_feed] = A.filepath(1), --[nre_feed]
	[treaty_year] = CONVERT(tinyint, A.filepath(2)), --[treaty_year]
	[v_created] = [v_created],
	[query_date] = CONVERT(datetime2, A.filepath(3)), --[query_date]
	[bordereaux_month],
	[tf_assumed_gross_written_premium],
	[tf_assumed_earned_premium],
	[tf_assumed_paid_losses],
	[tf_assumed_expected_losses],
	[tf_assumed_collected_premium],
	[tf_assumed_ss],
	[tf_assumed_paid_alae],
	[tf_assumed_paid_ulae]
FROM
	OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/northernre/treefrog_snapshots/*/*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'developmentdls',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
	WITH (
		nre_feed NVARCHAR(100),
		treaty_year TINYINT,
		v_created DATE,
		query_date DATETIME2,
		bordereaux_month DATE,
		tf_assumed_gross_written_premium MONEY,
		tf_assumed_earned_premium MONEY,
		tf_assumed_paid_losses MONEY,
		tf_assumed_expected_losses MONEY,
		tf_assumed_collected_premium MONEY,
		tf_assumed_ss MONEY,
		tf_assumed_paid_alae MONEY,
		tf_assumed_paid_ulae MONEY
	) A
GO
